answers.answer: I found out at 17w and they said im having a girl, im now 22w5d and shes still a girl!
We did yesterday 90 % chance a girl! But double checking on Friday :) and again at 20 weeks
I did! They said boy and its still a boy
Yep I had a scan at 16w exactly! And they said it was deffo a boy.... Well 5 weeks ago I have birth and it was a boy! Lol :) deffo worth having a gender scan at 16w! I'd deffo recommend!
Yes exactly at 16 weeks was a baby boy now at 22 is still a handsome lil boy :)
At 12w I was told 75% boy hes now 9 months & still a boy. Im now 32w tmw with a boy bt I wasnt told this time until 20 weeks.

I did with my last pregnancy boy and this pregnancy I was 19 weeks boy.I had my first boy in the 35th week because of preeclampsia. I can't wait to see if I make it to full term because I wasn't ready the first time around.

question: Did anyone find out the gender of there lil one at 16w pregnant? I have year and half  old daughter and expecting a baby :) hopefully its a boy!
title: gender @ 16w?
